name: Dungeon Hopper (GalacticCoach)
description: Dungeon Hopper is a side-view platformer game where you must quickly make your way through a parkour dungeon before the rising poisonous water reaches you. Make sure to watch out for spikes and goblins along the way, and see how many coins you can collect! The difficulty ramps up quickly, so see if you can complete the ultimate challenge that is the fifth level!
